edu.holycross.shot.greekutils
[Groovy] Class MilesianString

java.lang.Object
  edu.holycross.shot.greekutils.MilesianString

class MilesianString

A class for working with numeric data in the Milesian notational system.

Constructor Summary
MilesianString(java.lang.String srcString)

Constructor creating a MilesianString from a String value.
MilesianString(java.lang.String srcString, java.lang.String greekMapping)

Constructor verifies that srcString, supplied in an identified system for encoding Greek, contains only valid characters for a MilesianString's underlying representation.

MilesianString

MilesianString(java.lang.String srcString)
Constructor creating a MilesianString from a String value.

Exception if srcString is not valid.
Parameters:
srcString - String representation of a MilesianString.

MilesianString

MilesianString(java.lang.String srcString, java.lang.String greekMapping)
Constructor verifies that srcString, supplied in an identified system for encoding Greek, contains only valid characters for a MilesianString's underlying representation.

returns:
Sum of converting integer and fractional components individually.

toString

java.lang.String toString()
Overrides default toString method.
returns:
String representation of MilesianString.

toString

java.lang.String toString(boolean asBeta)
Overrides default toString method, with option to choose format of String. If asBeta is true, uses ASCII-only representation; otherwise, uses representation from polytonic Greek section of Unicode.
returns:
String representation of MilesianString.
Parameters:
asBeta - True if String should be ASCII only.
